row.process:
:IF &UC4RB_RM_OWNER# <> "" : IF &UC4RB_RM_FAIL_EXISTS# = "YES" : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm CreateEnvironment -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ? -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -o "&UC4RB_RM_OWNER#" -f "&UC4RB_RM_FOLDER#" -t "&UC4RB_RM_CUSTOM_TYPE#" ? -n "&UC4RB_RM_ENV_NAME#" -fe : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR : ELSE : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm CreateEnvironment -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ? -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -o "&UC4RB_RM_OWNER#" -f "&UC4RB_RM_FOLDER#" -t "&UC4RB_RM_CUSTOM_TYPE#" ? -n "&UC4RB_RM_ENV_NAME#" : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
: ENDIF :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_RM_FAIL_EXISTS# = "YES" : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm CreateEnvironment -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ? -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -f "&UC4RB_RM_FOLDER#" -t "&UC4RB_RM_CUSTOM_TYPE#" ? -n "&UC4RB_RM_ENV_NAME#" -fe : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR : ELSE : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm CreateEnvironment -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ? -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -f "&UC4RB_RM_FOLDER#" -t "&UC4RB_RM_CUSTOM_TYPE#" ? -n "&UC4RB_RM_ENV_NAME#" : JCL_CONCAT_CHAR : ENDIF :ENDIF
